title: Game: Start stream on mobile then cast it
custom_preconds:
GIVEN an entitled user
AND no cast session exists
custom_steps:
WHEN the user selects a game
AND the user selects the casting icon from within the game feed
AND the user selects the casting device
custom_expected: THEN the feed is successfully casted to the casting device

title: Game: Start cast session then play content
custom_preconds:
GIVEN an entitled user
AND casting session exists
custom_steps:
WHEN user chooses a casting device
AND user selects a stream
custom_expected: THEN the feed is successfully casted to the casting device

title: Game: While casting content switch to Game stream
custom_preconds:
GIVEN an entitled user
AND VOD/SVOD content is already streaming
custom_steps: WHEN the user selects a game
custom_expected: THEN the game stream is successfully casted to the casting device

title: Game: Cast a complete Live Game
custom_preconds: GIVEN an entitled user
custom_steps: WHEN the user selects a live game
custom_expected: THEN the feed is cast to the device for the entirety of its length

title: Game: Cast a complete Archive Game
custom_preconds: GIVEN an entitled user
custom_steps: WHEN the user selects an archive game
custom_expected: THEN the feed is cast to the device for the entirety of its length

title: VOD: Start stream on mobile then cast it
custom_preconds:
GIVEN an entitled user
AND no casting session exists
custom_steps: WHEN the user selects VOD content
custom_expected: THEN the feed is successfully casted to the casting device

title: VOD: Start cast session then play content
custom_preconds:
GIVEN an entitled user
AND casting session exists
custom_steps:
WHEN the user selects VOD content
AND content is playing on the device
AND the user selects the casting icon from within the media player
AND the user selects the casting device
custom_expected: THEN the feed is successfully casted to the casting device

title: SVOD: Start stream on mobile then cast it
custom_preconds: GIVEN an entitled user
custom_steps:
WHEN the user selects SVOD content
AND content is playing on the device
AND the user selects the casting icon from within the media player
AND the user selects the casting device
custom_expected: THEN the SVOD content is successfully casted to the casting device

title: SVOD: Start cast session then play content
custom_preconds:
GIVEN an entitled user
AND no casting session exists
custom_steps:
WHEN the user selects SVOD content
AND content is playing on the device
AND the user selects the casting icon from within the media player
AND the user selects the casting device
custom_expected: THEN the feed is successfully casted to the casting device

title: SVOD: Attempt to cast when unentitled
custom_preconds:
GIVEN an un-entitled user (not logged in / free account)
AND cast session exists
custom_expected: THEN content is not casted to casting device

title: VOD/SVOD: While casting Game content switch to VOD/SVOD stream
custom_preconds:
GIVEN an entitled user
AND cast session is playing SVOD content
custom_expected: THEN VOD stream should play on casting device

title: FLIVE: Start a stream on mobile then cast it
custom_preconds: GIVEN an entitled user
custom_steps:
WHEN the user selects FLIVE content
AND content is playing on the device
AND the user selects the casting icon from within the media player
AND the user selects the casting device
custom_expected: THEN the FLIVE content is successfully casted to the casting device

title: SLIVE: Start stream on mobile then cast it
custom_preconds: GIVEN an entitled user
custom_steps:
WHEN the user selects SLIVE content
AND content is playing on the device
AND the user selects the casting icon from within the media player
AND the user selects the casting device
custom_expected: THEN the SLIVE content is successfully casted to the casting device

title: Mobile: Test casting from launch points throughout the app
custom_preconds:
GIVEN an entitled user
AND casting is enabled to the receiver device

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user launches a VOD clip from Scores Page
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the feed casts successfully to the receiver device

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user launches a game from Scores Page
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the feed casts successfully to the receiver device

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user launches a VOD clip from the Home Surface
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the feed casts successfully to the receiver device

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user launches a game from the Home Surface
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the feed casts successfully to the receiver device

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user launches a VOD clip from the Team Page
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the feed casts successfully to the receiver device

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user launches a game from the Team Page
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the feed casts successfully to the receiver device

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user launches a game from the Watch View- Games Tab
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the feed casts successfully to the receiver device

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user launches a VOD clip from the Watch View- Watch Now Tab
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the feed casts successfully to the receiver device

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user launches a game from the Watch View- Watch Now Tab
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the feed casts successfully to the receiver device

title: Mobile: Casting controls
custom_preconds:
GIVEN an existing cast session exists
AND media is playing
custom_steps:
WHEN MLB App is active
AND user controls are visible
custom_expected: THEN controls should control media playback on casting device

title: Mobile: Casting notification controls
custom_preconds:
GIVEN an existing cast session exists
AND media is playing
custom_steps:
WHEN mobile device is on the lock screen
AND user controls are visible
custom_expected: THEN controls should control media playback on casting device

title: Mobile: Background the app while casting
custom_preconds:
GIVEN an existing cast session exists
AND media is playing
custom_steps: WHEN user backgrounds the MLB app
custom_expected: THEN casted media should continue playing

title: Mobile: Put device in sleep mode while casting
custom_preconds:
GIVEN an existing cast session exists
AND media is playing
custom_steps: WHEN mobile device is put in sleep mode
custom_expected: THEN casted media should continue playing

title: Casting -> Select Closed Captioning
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user casting from the MLB
custom_steps:
WHEN the user selects the CC button on the player controls on the mobile device
AND the user selects the English option
AND the user selects OK
custom_expected: THEN closed captions will appear on the device to which the media is being casted (Only if Closed Captions are available as part of the feed)

title: Casting -> Stop Casting behavior
custom_preconds:
GIVEN an existing cast session exists
AND media is playing
custom_steps:
WHEN the user selects the casting icon from within the media player
AND user selects Stop Casting
custom_expected: THEN casting device media playback should stop and return to disconnected idle state.
